Articles.Content:
Hi,

I´ve got a problem with  the entry purchase option.

I just started a new career, and disabled the "no entry purchase" option.

After customizing all options, I accepted and the game started.

When I went to the R&D facility i saw that every part had been purchased. Furthermore, the option "no entry on purchase" has disappeared (from the ingame settings menu).

 

I really would appreciate some help.

 

Thank you 

p.s.: i use a lot of mods and had no problems so far (i already have an active career with the purchase option working).

Added some new mods (engineering techtree;kerbalism and SSTU and added the TAC profile for kerbalism) i backuped my savegames and started the new career.

 

I´ve tested to revert everything, but the problem is still existing now with my old career savegame. The parts i had not  purchased are now purchased and the option is not available (invisible) in the settings menu.

 

Edited March 14, 2017 by Phil Kerman
